ChemicalAffectsGene.description: Describes an effect that a chemical has on a gene or gene product (e.g. an impact of on its abundance, activity,localization, processing, expression, etc.)
subject: SmallMolecule

ChemicalToPathway.description: An interaction between a chemical entity and a biological process or pathway.
subject: SmallMolecule

DiseaseOrPhenotypicFeatureToGeneticInher.description: A relationship between either a disease or a phenotypic feature and its mode of (genetic) inheritance.
subject: Disease
PhenotypicFeature

DiseaseToPhenotypicFeature.description: A relationship between a disease and a phenotypic feature in which the phenotypic feature is associated with the disease in some way.
subject: Disease

GeneToGeneCoexpression.description: Indicates that two genes or gene products are co-expressed, generally under the same conditions.
subject: Gene
Protein
RnaTranscript
